title: Harm Reduction (Tips & Tricks #36)
author: John "Halcyon" Styn
content:
Yes, let yourself be free at Burning Man! But there are some important practices to make sure you don’t go to jail, go deaf, or die.

This hour conversation with Mitchell Gomez of Dancesafe  is packed with info about Drugs, Cops, & Sex at Burning Man.

Rather listen to the hour conversation as audio only? Available as a podcast on itunes and Stitcher

(NOTE: The opinions expressed are solely those of Halcyon & Mitchell, Burning Man participants.)

Search for more of Halcyon’s Tips in the Burning Man Journal or visit PlayaPrinciples.com
